name: QCCompositionRepository
desc: The QCCompositionRepository class represents a system-wide centralized repository of built-in and installed Quartz Composer compositions (/Library/Compositions and ~/Library/Compositions). The QCCompositionRepository class cannot be subclassed.

items.name: class func shared() -> QCCompositionRepository!
items.desc: Returns the shared instance of the composition repository.

items.name: func composition(withIdentifier: String!) -> QCComposition!
items.desc: Returns the composition that corresponds to the identifier.

items.name: func compositions(withProtocols: [Any]!, andAttributes: [AnyHashable : Any]!) -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array of compositions that match a set of criteria.

items.name: func allCompositions() -> [Any]!
items.desc: Returns an array that contains all compositions currently in the composition repository.

items.name: static let QCCompositionRepositoryDidUpdate: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: Posted whenever the list of compositions in the composition repository is updated.
